author: Charles Vexenat
description: A whole shot of absinthe tamed by lime, sugar and plenty of water. The cucumber is an essential freshening element.
name: Green Beast (Fresh Version)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add remaining ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
